css: .dhx-cal-qi-controls{display:none !important}.CALENDAR-INDEX-0,.CALENDAR-INDEX-0.dhx_body,.CALENDAR-INDEX-0.dhx_title{background-color:#2b4c1d;color:#fff}.CALENDAR-INDEX-1,.CALENDAR-INDEX-1.dhx_body,.CALENDAR-INDEX-1.dhx_title{background-color:#fedd65;color:#241c1c}.CALENDAR-INDEX-2,.CALENDAR-INDEX-2.dhx_body,.CALENDAR-INDEX-2.dhx_title{background-color:#fcc601;color:#241c1c}.CALENDAR-INDEX-3,.CALENDAR-INDEX-3.dhx_body,.CALENDAR-INDEX-3.dhx_title{background-color:#94cc7e;color:#241c1c}.CALENDAR-INDEX-4,.CALENDAR-INDEX-4.dhx_body,.CALENDAR-INDEX-4.dhx_title{background-color:#56993c;color:#241c1c}.CALENDAR-INDEX-5,.CALENDAR-INDEX-5.dhx_body,.CALENDAR-INDEX-5.dhx_title,.dhx_cal_navline{background-color:#005e73;color:#fff}.CALENDAR-INDEX-6,.CALENDAR-INDEX-6.dhx_body,.CALENDAR-INDEX-6.dhx_title{background-color:#464640;color:#fff}.dhx-cal-month-cell:last-of-type,.dhx-scale-bar:last-of-type{border-right:none}.dhx_cal_tab.active,.dhx_cal_tab.active:hover,.dhx_cal_tab:hover,.dhx_cal_today_button:hover{background-color:#004656!important}.dhx_cal_tab,.dhx_cal_today_button{color:#004656}.dhx_cal_next_button::before,.dhx_cal_prev_button::before,.dhx_cal_tab.active{color:#fff}.dhtmlXTooltip.tooltip,.dhx_cal_quick_info,.dhx_cal_tab,.dhx_cal_tab.active,.dhx_cal_tab:hover,.dhx_cal_today_button,.dhx_cal_today_button:hover{background-color:#fff;border:2px solid #241c1c}.dhx_cal_header{border:none;left:0!important}.dhx_cal_agenda_event_line_marker,.dhx_cal_event_clear::before,.dhx_cal_qi_tcontent::before{display:none}.dhx_cal_agenda_day_events:first-child,.dhx_cal_agenda_day_header:first-child,.dhx_cal_month_cell:first-child,.dhx_scale_bar:first-child{border-top:2px solid #241c1c;border-right:none;border-left:none;border-bottom:none}.dhx_cal_agenda_day_events:not(:first-child),.dhx_cal_agenda_day_header:not(:first-child),.dhx_cal_month_cell:not(:first-child),.dhx_scale_bar:not(:first-child){border-top:2px solid #241c1c;border-left:2px solid #241c1c;border-right:none;border-bottom:none}.dhx_scale_bar{line-height:100%;font-size:min(16px, 2.6vw);font-variant:all-small-caps}.dhtmlXTooltip.tooltip{box-shadow:none}.event{height:auto!important}.dhx_cal_agenda_day{border:none;--dhx-scheduler-agenda-event-date-width:auto}.dhx_cal_agenda_day:last-child{border-bottom:2px solid #242c1c}.dhx_cal_data{border:none}.dhx_cal_agenda_event_line,.dhx_cal_event_clear,.dhx_cal_event_line{border:2px solid #242c1c!important;border-radius:4px!important}#loader{background:url(\"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PBotond/XJCSCS_calendar/refs/heads/main/1490.gif\") center center no-repeat!important}.dhx_after .dhx_month_body,.dhx_after .dhx_month_head,.dhx_before .dhx_month_body,.dhx_before .dhx_month_head{background-color:#e7e5e5}
